long_description: Intelligent design allows the GCI Xpress Lounger chair to fold flat for easy transportation to and from the campground, kids' soccer game or backyard barbecue. Chair quickly and easily expands into a full-size camp chair for your lounging comfort; when folded, the built-in webbing handle lets you easily tote the chair around. Steel construction is strong and sturdy, with a maximum capacity of 250 lbs. Pockets on each arm hold a cell phone, a cold beverage and other small essentials. Nylon mesh seat won't hold water should it get left out in a rain shower.
short_description: Intelligent design allows the GCI Xpress Lounger chair to fold flat for easy transportation to and from the campground, kids' soccer game or backyard barbecue.
